name: Escape From Life
descriptionShort: Discover a 4-season cabin oasis in Prince Edward Island! Just 15 minutes from Summerside, 17 from Cavendish, 40 from Charlottetown, and 10 from the bridge. This cozy retreat sleeps 9. Enjoy a hot tub, cold plunge, and propane BBQ with deck seating. With AC and weekly summer rentals (2-day minimum off-season), it’s perfect for families or a romantic escape. Winter visitors, 4-wheel drive is recommended!
